sentences.en: The cantata has a difficult vocal score.
sentences.cn: 这个康塔塔有个难度很大的声乐总谱.

sentences.en: The choral society sang the new cantata composed by its leader.
sentences.cn: 该合唱队演唱了他们领队编写的大合唱.

sentences.en: The music of the song has been rearranged for the cantata.
sentences.cn: 这支歌改编已成大合唱.

words.tran_cn: 大合唱；（意）清唱剧；康塔塔（一种声乐套曲）

trans.tran_en: a piece of religious music for singers and instruments
